snippet: Braylon Edwards will reunite with his friend Mark Sanchez and the Jets despite recently calling the team’s front office “idiots.”
abstract: New York Jets claim wide receiver Braylon Edwards off waivers week after Edwards criticized the organization's front office on Twitter.
lead_paragraph: Braylon Edwards will reunite with his friend Mark Sanchez and the Jets despite recently calling the team’s front office “idiots.”

headline.seo: Despite Insult on Twitter, Braylon Edwards Rejoins Jets
headline.main: Despite Dig on Twitter, Edwards Rejoins Jets
headline.print_headline: Despite Dig On Twitter, Edwards Rejoins Jets
